confirm_model.title: Confirm your model
confirm_model.description: Please check that your device is a Redmi 9C/9C NFC.

confirm_os.title: Confirm OS version
confirm_os.description: Your device must be running the latest Android 10 MIUI firmware. Refer to the link for more instructions.

unlock_phone.title: Unlock the bootloader
unlock_phone.description: Before installing Droidian you must unlock the bootloader of your phone manually. Follow the steps in the linked page if you haven't already.

bootloader.title: Reboot to Bootloader
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press and hold the VOLUME DOWN button and plug the device into your PC via USB. After some seconds you'll see the fastboot mode.

cutie_notice.title: Cutie Shell: Notice
cutie_notice.description: You selected to install Droidian with Cutie Shell. Cutie Shell is still pre-alpha quality and it is not suitable for production environments. Keep in mind that Cutie Shell is not officially supported or endorsed by Droidian. This edition is maintained directly by Cutie Shell Community Project and you should report any bugs with these images at Cutie Shell Community Project before filing upstream.
